stories.title: First plasma propels Zap Energy's plans for garage-sized fusion reactors

stories.text: I'm a SWE II at a high growth tech company (think Airbnb, Robinhood, Doordash, etc.) and was recently promoted to Senior SWE. I graduated pretty recently and this is my first job (1.5 YOE at this role, around 2 freelancing + internships during uni) and I want to know how I can be a better Senior SWE, I know a lot of the skills that make some senior come with experience , which I currently lack, so how do I make up for it? Any books, courses or resources?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do I become a better Senior SWE?
SCOTUS Says You Can't Sue the Cops for Violating Your Miranda Rights
Amazon's Alexa could soon mimic voice of dead relatives

stories.text:
I got an instagram direct message from someone who I don’t follow and who does not follow me. It came directly to my inbox. How is this possible? My instagram settings say that messages from other people on instagram will go to my requests.

It was a spam message, the person’s account clearly got hacked.
stories.title: I got an Instagram direct message despite my security settings?
Largest Python Found in Everglades Signals a Threat
